author: Matt Estrada
comment: Small problems are that the second hand doesn't do the sweeping 5 ticks per second of an automatic movement like the preview site shows. And the watch face is different from the preview and pictures. Currently the 5min markers are the accent color instead of white.
title: Update: now working!

author: Jay R Throne
comment: If there was an option for Fahrenheit weather instead of just Celsius... Am I missing something? Or is this not an option? Should be.
title: Would give 5 stars...

author: LIANG JERRY
comment: I like this app. could u have an update for samsung gear s soonest ? I couldnt sync it with the watch with the current version. Thks
title: Help

author: Nate F
comment: No fahrenheit? Apparently there is no setting to switch to fahrenheit.

author: Jay S Brindle
comment: I'm on 5.1 and it loads a totally different watch face to my watch even tho it shows as the right one on the face menu on the watch and wear app :s
title: Doesn't work Moto 360

author: Rhys Donovan
comment: doesnt seem to work on my Moto 360 on 5.0.1, cant enable it :( Will update review if watchface gets updated to work.
title: doesnt work on moto 360 5.0.1

author: cort williams
comment: Currently when I switch to this watch face it instead switches to the built in Moto 360 Simple watch face. Hope it gets fixed soon.
title: Not working.

author: Rob Maynard
comment: As another reviewer said, it displays the Moto 360's "Simple" theme on the watch. Android 4.4.4, Droid Turbo. Will update review once dev has a chance to look into it
title: Not working

author: Paul Preece
comment: This is not working on the moto 360, it just shows a simple time. Please fix asap.
title: Not Working.

comment: Doesnt work on 5.01 lg watch r

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content:
Thank you for the review it will definitely help our application to get stable. We regularly push updates, Can you please let us know the issue you are facing. 
Regards

comment: Does not work LG watch R
title: Doesn't work

comment: I really like the watch face, would look great on a Moto 360.
title: Sleek

author: Jene Adelam
comment: Battery optimized watch face, using it for 3-4 days and giving good battery time with clean army style needles
title: Moto 360
